main.name: Ben Bartholomew
main.description: I'm a Senior Computer Science/Business & Management double major at Knox College. I'm currently looking for software development opportunities for Summer 2023. I'm a Full Stack Software Engineer and this website is a showcase of me and my projects
main.bio: A 22 year old baseball player and sport enthusiast. My lifelong involvement in sport has lead me to develop a competitive nature the ability to not only make myself better but others better around me in a team. I love learning new languages and frameworks but I'm most confortable with Java, Dart, Python and C#. Outside of coding I enjoy playing and watching sports, gaming and eating food.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to get in touch with me. My professional email is benjamenbartholomew@gmail.com.
